meanings.definition: The action or process of detonating.
meanings.sent1: The detonation of the firecracker startled the cat.
meanings.sent2: The detonation of the bomb could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected detonation of the balloon made everyone jump.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a detonation of joy in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The detonation of the rocket lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A sudden and violent release of energy caused by an explosion.
meanings.sent1: The detonation of the volcano shook the entire island.
meanings.sent2: The detonation of the gas tank caused widespread damage.
meanings.sent3: The detonation of the confetti cannon surprised the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The news of his resignation was a detonation in the office.
meanings.sent5: The detonation of emotions in the room was palpable.
